sentences.en: After the discussion of my dissertation I taught him Chinese.
sentences.cn: 讨论完我的论文,我就教他中文.

sentences.en: Diploma and certificate courses do not normally require the submission of a dissertation.
sentences.cn: 为获得文凭和证书所修的课程通常不需要提交论文。

sentences.en: Each student has a supervisor to advise on the writing of the dissertation.
sentences.cn: 每个学生都有导师指导他们写论文。

sentences.en: He could not understand Riemann's work on Abelian functions nor Roch's contributions in his dissertation.
sentences.cn: 他不能理解Riemann在Abel函数方面的工作,也不懂Roch论文中的论著.

sentences.en: He is currently writing a dissertation on the Somali civil war.
sentences.cn: 他目前正在写一篇关于索马里内战的论文。

sentences.en: He was involved in writing his doctoral dissertation.
sentences.cn: 他在聚精会神地写他的博士论文.

sentences.en: His doctoral dissertation on differential equations connected itself with existence theorems.
sentences.cn: 他论述微分方程的博士论文涉及到存在理论.

sentences.en: I'm supposed to have handed in a first draft of my dissertation.
sentences.cn: 我本该把论文的初稿交上去了。

sentences.en: I'm working my notes up into a dissertation.
sentences.cn: 我正在把我的笔记修改成论文.

sentences.en: Implications of these findings are discussed at the end of the dissertation.
sentences.cn: 在论文最后,我们还讨论了研究成果的应用.

sentences.en: It also points out that this dissertation still has some deficits.
sentences.cn: 第五章,总结全文,指出这篇论文尚有不足.

sentences.en: Main contributions of the dissertation are summarized as follows.
sentences.cn: 以下则摘要地叙述本论文的主要贡献.

sentences.en: Makes the dissertation and after oral defense obtains the degree.
sentences.cn: 做学位论文并通过论文答辩后取得学位.

sentences.en: She wrote a dissertation on superrealism.
sentences.cn: 她写了一篇关于超现实主义的论文.

sentences.en: This dissertation researches the functions of real right of pledge.
sentences.cn: 本文研究的角度是两岸担保物权的功能与价值取向.

trans.tran_en: a long piece of writing on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree
